title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A, the response must identify the most common level of education spending by states in the Southeast.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a similarity or difference in public education spending by state or region, as illustrated in the map.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about that similarity or difference in public education spending by state or region, as illustrated in the map.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how public education spending as shown in the map demonstrates the principle of federalism.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all four of the tasks set by the question.
